actions.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1753 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 44. Record Vote Number: 359.
Motion to table amendment SA 1753 made in Senate.

Amendment SA 1753 proposed by Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S11784-11788, S11805-11807; text: CR S11784) To strike section 333 relating to a special judicial appeals process for cases involving timber harvesting in the Tongass National Forest.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1753 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 44. Record Vote Number: 359.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1753 proposed by Senator Boxer.

purpose: To strike section 333 relating to a special judicial appeals process for cases involving timber harvesting in the Tongass National Forest.
